00017 package WeBWorK::HTML::ComboBox;
00018 use base qw(Exporter);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::HTML::ComboBox - HTML widget for a textfield with a dropdown list
00023 
00024 =cut
00025 
00026 use strict;
00027 use warnings;
00028 use Carp;
00029 
00030 our @EXPORT    = ();
00031 our @EXPORT_OK = qw(
00032     comboBox
00033 );
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 sub comboBox {
00038     my ($options, @Records) = @_;
00039     
00040     my %options = (%$options);
00041     # %options must contain:
00042     #  name - name of combo list -- use $r->param("$name")
00043     #  request - the WeBWorK::Request object for the current request
00044     # may contain:
00045     #  default - default selection from pop_up list
00046     #  rows - number of rows shown in option list
00047     #  multiple - are multiple selections allowed?
00048     
00049     croak "name not found in options" unless exists $options{name};
00050     croak "request not found in options" unless exists $options{request};
00051     my $name = $options{name};
00052     my $r = $options{request};
00053     
00054     my $default = $options{default};
00055     my $size = $options{size};
00056     $size = 1 unless defined $size;
00057     my $multiple = $options{multiple};
00058     $multiple = 0 unless defined $multiple;
00059 
00060     my $value = $r->param($name) || $default || "";
00061     
00062     my @values = ref $options{values} eq "ARRAY" ? @{ $options{values} } : ();
00063     my %labels = ref $options{labels} eq "HASH" ? %{ $options{labels} } : map { $_ => $_ } @values;
00064     
00065     # if someone just sends in the labels parameter, use all of them as values
00066     @values = keys %labels if (%labels and not @values);
00067 
00068     # makes $size = length of longest value + 4
00069     my $width = 20;
00070     map { $width = 4 + length if (length) > $width } @values;
00071 
00072     
00073 
00074     my %textfield_options = (
00075             -name => $name,
00076             -value => $value,
00077             -size => $width,        # we need to calculate this to be the same as the popup_menu
00078             -onKeyUp => "followType('$name')",
00079     );
00080     
00081     my %popup_options = (
00082             -name => $name,
00083             -values => \@values,
00084             -labels => \%labels,
00085             -default => $default || $r->param($name) || 0,
00086             -size => $size,
00087             -onChange => "changeText('$name')",
00088     );  
00089 
00090     return CGI::span({-class=>"OptionList"},
00091         CGI::table({cellpadding => 0, cellspacing => 0, border => 0}, 
00092             CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({}, CGI::textfield({%textfield_options}))),
00093             CGI::Tr({}, CGI::td({}, CGI::popup_menu({%popup_options}))),
00094         ),
00095         # this script alters the text box to be the same size as the select menu
00096         # and also provides a function to change the textbox text to the currently selected option
00097         CGI::script(join ("\n",
00098             "// set textbox width to be same as that of select menu",
00099             "document.getElementsByName('$name')[0].style.width = document.getElementsByName('$name')[1].offsetWidth;",
00100             "// set textbox text to be same as that of select menu",
00101             "function changeText (name) {
00102                 var textbox = document.getElementsByName(name)[0];
00103                 var select = document.getElementsByName(name)[1];
00104                 textbox.value = select.options[select.selectedIndex].value;
00105             }",
00106             "// try to select best option in select menu as user types in textbox",
00107             "function followType (name) {
00108                 var textbox = document.getElementsByName(name)[0];
00109                 var select = document.getElementsByName(name)[1];
00110                 var textboxValue = textbox.value
00111                 for (var i = 0; (i < select.options.length) && (select.options[i].value.indexOf(textboxValue) != 0); i++) {}
00112                 select.selectedIndex = i;
00113             }",
00114 #           "changeText('$name');",
00115         )),
00116     );
00117 
00118     return CGI::span({-class=>"OptionList"},
00119         CGI::textfield({
00120             name => $name,
00121             value => $value,
00122             size => $size,      # we need to calculate this to be the same as the popup_menu
00123         }), CGI::br(),
00124         CGI::popup_menu(
00125             -name => $name,
00126             -values => \@values,
00127             -labels => \%labels,
00128             -default => $r->param($name),
00129         ),
00130     );
00131 }
00132 
00133 1;
